main.name: Lin Ming
main.description: Top talented web developer of 6+ years of experience dedicated to building and optimizing the performance of user-centrist, high-impact websites and solutions for nationwide and global companies.
main.bio: Leverage technical, analytical and problem-solving skills to create dynamic, high-speed websites, apps and platforms fueling competitive advantage and revenue growth.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: North China University of Science and Technology

work.title: Freelancer
work.description: Over the last year, I have been building various types of products for several start-up companies. My representative project is a sound marketing website for sound maker customers. In this product, I act as a senior front-end developer and dude to all over the code challenges successfully with React, Redux, React Hooks, AWS EC2, S3, CloudFront, Stripe Payment, UI/UX, and google plus APIs as well. Also, gained a lot of experience and proficiency in Teamwork, Remote working and so on.

work.title: Senior Developer
work.description:
Improves systems performance by investigating problems, developing specifications, identifying trends in technology, and recommending solutions 
Assist other developers in resolving issues by providing guidance and training 
Performs other duties as assigned by management 
May make hardware or software purchasing recommendations regarding web development 
Work is constantly performed in an office environment 
May develop a range of products including device drivers, patches, operating system modifications, graphics modules, etc 
Collaborate with web-developers building a browser-based front-end using HTML and JavaScript
